alert.note: Alert for Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 5:47AM AKST until February 11 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Juneau, Elfin Cove, Pelican, and Gustavus. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Snow will be wet and heavy in weight and will be difficult to manage. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to cool back down below freezing Thursday night ahead of the next system that arrives late Thursday night into Friday. Precipitation is expected to begin as snow before changing to all rain late Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
